'''Hive Games Limited'''<ref>{{Citation|url=https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/08451891|title=GOV.UK|website=find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk}}</ref> also known as '''The Hive''', or simply '''Hive''', is a third-party organization primarily specialized in creating ''[[Minecraft]]'' content and upholding their [[featured server]]. Their work also includes [[add-on]]s, skin packs, worlds, [[event server]]s and external programs in partnership with ''[[Minecraft]]''.
